1.title: ¡León y 'El Chino' mueren el mismo día!
1.plot: León marries Lucía in a beautiful wedding with their loved ones. El Chino tells Lupita that he murdered a judge and could be executed in the electric chair.

2.title: Lucía es la principal sospechosa de la muerte de León
2.plot: León resuscitates in the body of Chino and discovers that everyone wants to kill him. Lucía tells an investigator that she knows she is the main suspect in León's death.

3.title: León llega a México
3.plot: León calls Lucia and tells her that he is alive, but she thinks it is a joke. Lucia is interrogated by a detective about León's death.

4.title: Lucía o Eva ¿Quién se quedará a cargo del grupo Carvajal?
4.plot: Lucia begins to hallucinate and thinks she sees León telling her that she is a murderer. El Chino is still trying to discover why he is in the body of another man. León looks for an old friend to ask for help and recover his life.

5.title: León se reencuentra con Lucía
5.plot: Eva insults Lucia and she slaps her so that she respects her. Johny decides to hire very dangerous people in the company even though León did not trust them.

6.title: ¿Le confesará León la verdad a Lucía?
6.plot: An investigator interrogates Eva to find out who could have killed León, but she only blames Lucía. Lucía gives an interview to talk about León.

7.title: Eva es amante de El Alacrán
7.plot: León starts working for Lucía as her new driver. Lucía remembers when León asked her to marry him.

8.title: León descubre el secreto de Lucía
8.plot: Guillermo tells Johny that he will stay at the company and that he discovered that someone stole money from his father. Eva goes unauthorized to Lucía's room looking for evidence to blame her for León's death.

9.title: León buscará vengarse
9.plot: León finds out that Lucia will meet Johny and offers to take her, but she refuses. Guillermo goes out to take with a friend, but discovers that he is a bad man and takes him to a store to steal money.

10.title: 'Jacobo' intenta besar a Lucía
10.plot: León is very upset to discover that Lucía and Johny are lovers. Guillermo can not stop thinking about the man whose partner shot him and goes to look for him at the hospital.

11.title: Lucía despide a 'Jacobo'
11.plot: Juliana meets Valentina and both have a good time in the park. León can not hide his annoyance to discover that Lucía has always deceived him.

12.title: Lucía exige sus derechos como 'La viuda de México'
12.plot: Chino is determined to travel to Texas to find the money he buried and help Alicia and her son. Camilo finds a woman with the butterfly tattoo, but when he is about to approach her she flees.

13.title: Eva les declara la guerra a Johny y a Lucía
13.plot: Lucía asks Jacobo to go back to work at home and he accepts. Renata accompanies Guillermo to visit the man from the liquor store. Alacrán's men kidnap Eva and take her with him.

14.title: 'Jacobo' besa a Lucía y ésta le corresponde
14.plot: El Chino decides to go with a sorcerer to investigate why he was reborn. El Alacrán demands his men not to approach Eva's newspaper.

15.title: El Chino está dispuesto a todo con tal de saber la verdad
15.plot: Valentina gets drunk and almost drowned, but León saves her. Teresa confronts Mateo because she believes that because of him her husband was murdered.

16.title: Lucía se burla de Jacobo
16.plot: Alicia feels very bad because the man who is with her is no longer the same. Karla decides to look for Camilo to help her recover her normal life.

17.title: El Chino viaja al más allá
17.plot: Guillermo learns that the man his partner attacked survived the operation, but will not be able to walk again. Johny asks one of Eva's employees to stop supporting her, as he plans to have more control of the company.

18.title: Lucía y Jacobo están en peligro
18.plot: El Chino accepts the sorcerer's help and meets the man he killed. Silvina tells Jacobo that he reminds her of León, because he acts like him.

19.title: La vida de Lucía está en manos de Eva
19.plot: El Chino can not stop thinking about all the people he murdered and starts to have visions. León and Lucía are ambushed by a group of armed men.

20.title: Lucía y Jacobo, un amor nace en un secuestro
20.plot: Jacobo and Lucía are kidnapped by armed men. Johny becomes nervous when he realizes that the investigator is getting closer and closer to finding León's real murderer.

21.title: Johny revela sus verdaderas intenciones por Lucía
21.plot: Eva and Johny do not know what to do to rescue Lucía from the kidnappers. The police track the signal of Lucía's and Jacobo's cell phones to find them.

22.title: Jacobo salva la vida de Lucía y ella le paga con un apasionado beso
22.plot: Valentina is nervous to think that Lucía could be dead. Johny begins to suspect that Jacobo could have something to do with Lucía's kidnapping and asks Camilo where he is from.

23.title: Lucía y Jacobo hacen el amor
23.plot: Lucía and Jacobo beat up one of their guards and manage to escape. Karla goes to a bar and meets her old husband, she gets very nervous and decides to leave. Lucia and Jacobo kiss for the first time in a river.

24.title: Lucía defiende a Jacobo de las acusaciones de Johny
24.plot: Alicia forces Beltrán to go to couple's therapy and he confesses that he is not the man she believes. Johny suspects that Lucía had something to do with Jacobo.

25.title: Jacobo deja a un lado su venganza para proteger a Lucía
25.plot: The inspector arrests Jacobo as a suspect in Lucia's kidnapping, but she, Camilo and Mateo defend him. Karla gets a gun and uses it to recover the money that was stolen from her at the casino.

26.title: Lucía Borges busca aliarse con el cártel de los Armenta
26.plot: Guillermo kisses Renata at a party. Guillermo arrives drunk at his house and Valentina helps him get to his room. Beltrán is determined to recover the money he stole to help Javier.

27.title: Eva le pone una trampa a Lucía para exponerla ante los medios
27.plot: Lucia decides to meet an Armenta in a library. Beltrán tells Barbara that they will travel to recover the money he buried in his past life.

28.title: Lucía revela el pacto que hizo con Servando Armenta
28.plot: Renata is about to confess to Guillermo what happened at the party, but Eva interrupts them. The casino men enter Karla's house and beat her father as revenge for the money she stole.

29.title: ¿El homicida de León Carvajal fue descubierto?
29.plot: Armenta says in the interview that Lucia did to him that he will respect all the journalists of the country. Karla asks Camilo to give his family the money he stole from the casino.

30.title: Tamayo huye de las amenazas de 'El Chino'
30.plot: Renata feels very sad to think that Guillermo might be interested in another woman. Jacobo discovers that there are a couple of men looking for him and he turns on an alarm in the building to escape.

31.title: Lucía se entera de que Jacobo es sospechoso de asesinar a León
31.plot: Montilla tells Lucía that they suspect that Jacobo could be León's killer. Jacobo tells Karla that he will accompany her to the casino to take revenge on the people who beat Pedro.

32.title: Johny golpea a Jacobo
32.plot: Johny goes to look for Lucía at home and almost sees her with Jacobo. Karla goes to the casino determined to earn the money she needs. Lucía can not stop thinking about Jacobo and the moments she has spent with him.

33.title: Jacobo le reclama a Lucía por ser amante de Johny
33.plot: Alacrán's men see Barbara and Beltrán in the Chino's house and spy on them to find out if they can obtain information about him. The casino men decide to torture Karla before killing her, but Camilo manages to save her.

34.title: Lucía trata de reconciliarse con Jacobo con un apasionado beso
34.plot: Jacobo tells Lucia that he knows he was cheating on León with Johny. Camilo tells Jacobo that Karla died in a fire, like the first time.

35.title: Johny deseará casarse con Lucía
35.plot: Eva gets upset when she arrives at her siblings house and discovers that they have a party for Guillermo's birthday. Mayela confesses to Guillermo that she is in love with him and kisses him, Renata sees them and becomes sad.

36.title: Jacobo podría reencontrarse con la hija de 'El Chino'
36.plot: Guillermo tells Jacobo that Toño shot a man in a liquor store. Jacobo learns that Valentina uses drugs. Jacobo discovers that Valentina's friend is Juliana, El Chino's daughter.

37.title: Lupita es secuestrada por 'El Alacrán'
37.plot: Guillermo tells Renata that he knows he kissed her and confesses that Mayela is not his girlfriend. Alacrán's men kidnap Lupita to help them find Chino.

38.title: Armenta descubre el oscuro pasado de Lucía
38.plot: Lucía attends a dinner with Armenta and he tells her that he knows everything about her past. Guillermo sees an interview of Mayela assuring that they are in a relationship and he gets bothered with her.

39.title: Johny le propone a Lucía que se casen en secreto
39.plot: Jacobo discovers that El Alacran kidnapped Chino's wife and is determined to help her. Johny proposes to Lucía to confess that they have a relationship, but she refuses.

40.title: Lucía y Johny recibieron un paquete que pone en evidencia su traición a León
40.plot: Lucia and Johny receive a package in León's name and they get very nervous. Mayela asks Renata to help her conquer Guillermo.

41.title: Lucía y Eva tuvieron otra feroz pelea
41.plot: Beltrán tells Barbara that he has to kill Alacrán or he will kill Lupita. Renata decides to resign because she can no longer support the relationship with Guillermo. Bárbara and Beltrán find a man who, like him, is a reborn man.

42.title: Lucía le confesó a Jacobo que está enamorada de él
42.plot: Valentina teaches Juliana how to swim and kisses her in the pool. Guillermo goes to look for Renata at her home to talk about her resignation and asks her to return to work with him.

43.title: Johny descubrió que Jacobo está enamorado de Lucía
43.plot: Juliana finds out that her mother is badly injured at the hospital and goes to look for her. Camilo and Jacobo meet a woman who says that in her past life she was a man.

44.title: Jacobo les arruinó una noche de pasión a Lucía y Johny
44.plot: Alacrán's men kidnap Lupe's friend to tell them where she is. Jacobo sends a compromising photograph to Lucía and Johny in the name of León.

45.title: 'El Chino' salvó a su esposa Lupita de ser asesinada
45.plot: Guillermo tells Renata that he is not interested in Mayela and kisses her. Beltrán and Jacobo help Lupe and save her from the men who want to kill her.

46.title: Lucía fue secuestrada nuevamente por los hombres de Armenta
46.plot: Eva decides to move to Lucía's house while her's is being remodeled, but Lucía is not happy with the news. Valentina and Juliana make the assassins believe that Lupe is dead and they save her life.

47.title: Lucía descubrió que Armenta quiere que sea su esposa
47.plot: Mateo tells Valentina that he will post a note in the newspaper saying that Lupe is dead so that Alacrán's will no longer look for her. Armenta tells Lucía that he wants to spend the night with her.

48.title: Lucía se libra de pasar una noche íntima con Armenta
48.plot: Camilo and Jacobo talk to a man who claims to have come back to life several times and they discover important things about the reborn. Mateo is with one of Alacrán's hit men to get information about his frauds.

49.title: 'El Chino' descubrió que otra persona está en el cuerpo de su vida anterior
49.plot: Johny tells Lucía that he thinks she is interested in Jacobo and that is why she defends him all the time. Mayela goes to look for Guillermo at his office and gets very upset when he realizes that he is not there and nobody knows about him.

50.title: Lucía y Jacobo desataron su pasión a unos pasos de Johny y Eva
50.plot: Jacobo forces Valentina to leave the hospital when she sees Alacrán's men, but she gets upset because she wants to help Juliana. Juliana meets Beltrán and thanks him for paying Lupe's hospital bill.

51.title: Jacobo se reencontró con Lupita, la esposa del 'Chino'
51.plot: Bárbara tells Beltrán that she will leave her store because she believes there are ghosts. Armenta gives Lucía a beautiful car and Eva thinks she has a new love.

52.title: Jacobo le confesó a Lupita que regresó de la muerte en el cuerpo del 'Chino'
52.plot: Lucía believes that Eva is the person who leaves messages in the name of León. Renata tells her friend that she is dating Guillermo.

53.title: Jacobo descubrió a Juliana y Valentina besándose
53.plot: Eva finds León's secret hiding place and is determined to do whatever it takes to enter. Jacobo tells Camilo that Valentina kissed Juliana. Guillermo confesses to Valentina that he is in love with Renata.

54.title: Lucía quiere pasar el resto de su vida con 'Jacobo'
54.plot: Valentina confesses to Guillermo that she is in love with Juliana and is worried about what people think. Montilla tells Johny that he believes that the person who ordered León to be killed works for the company.

55.title: ¡León Carvajal ya sabe quién lo mato!
55.plot: Guillermo complains to Mayela for telling Eva that he has a relationship with Renata. Jacobo discovers that Lucía and Johny are responsible for León's death.

56.title: ¡León le hará pagar a Johny su traición!
56.plot: Guillermo goes to look for Renata at her house, but she refuses to open the door. Lucho sees Jacobo hugging Valentina and thinks she's dating him.

57.title: Jacobo le propone matrimonio a Lucía
57.plot: Guillermo tells Eva that he will leave the company if Renata does not return to work with him. One of Alacrán's men tells Mateo that they work with León Carvajal's company.

58.title: Lucho descubre el amor de Juliantina
58.plot: Eva manages to open León's secret hiding place and Lucía gets upset when she learns that they entered without her. Lucho follows Valentina everywhere and sees her kissing Juliana. Eva tells El Alacrán that he has a traitor in his organization.

59.title: León le tiende una trampa a Lucía y a Johny
59.plot: El Alacrán is determined to get rid of Mateo if he keeps investigating his business. Johny discovers that Jacobo and Lucía are lovers.

60.title: Eva hará todo para separar a Juliantina
60.plot: Guillermo tells Valentina that he will leave the house because of Eva, she tries to convince him to stay, but he refuses. Lucía tells Jacobo that Johny knows they have a relationship and asks him to leave the house so that he does not hurt him.

61.title: Guille y Renata ya viven juntos
61.plot: Johny goes to look for Jacobo at Camilo's house and demands that he leave the country. Guillermo moves to Renata's house, but things do not go as he expects.

62.title: Johny descubre el secreto de 'Jacobo'
62.plot: Johny follows Jacobo and discovers that he has a family. Silvina tells Lucía that she thinks Jacobo has something to do with León's death, but she does not believe her.

63.title: Lucía corre a 'Jacobo' para siempre
63.plot: Johny tells Lucía that Jacobo has a family and shows her the photos to prove it. Eva demands Juliana to get away from Valentina and forbids her from entering any of her properties.

64.title: Servando Armenta secuestra a Valentina y a Lucía
64.plot: Armenta and his men kidnap Valentina to threaten Lucía and forcibly enter her house. Guillermo and Renata begin to have many problems living together, since he is used to another lifestyle.

65.title: Jacobo rescata a Lucía y a Valentina
65.plot: Eva asks Alacrán to guarantee Valentina's safety, but he refuses. The police arrive at the Carvajal mansion to save Lucía and Valentina. Jacobo kills Armenta before he hurts Valentina.

66.title: 'Jacobo' queda expuesto ante los enemigos del Chino
66.plot: Lupita tells Juliana that the person that is in El Chino's body is not her dad and she looks for him to know the truth. Johny prevents Lucía from discovering which hospital Jacobo is in. Valentina is emotionally affected by Armenta's attack.

67.title: El Chino salva a 'Jacobo' del Alacrán
67.plot: Jacobo's face is exposed on television and both Beltrán and El Alacrán identify him as El Chino. Camilo offers Valentina his help to overcome her trauma. Fabián decides to face El Chino by himself and heads to the hospital.

68.title: El Chino le revela su identidad a León Carvajal
68.plot: Valentina and Juliana interrogate Camilo about his relationship with Jacobo, since they know he is a hit man. Fabián tries to assassinate Jacobo, but Beltrán defends him.

69.title: Guille pagará por el crimen que cometió
69.plot: Lupita sees Juliana kissing Valentina and gets upset, because she refuses to believe that her daughter is in love with a woman. Mateo hits Johny and blames him for Susana's death.

70.title: Lucía y 'Jacobo', ¿se destruirán mutuamente?
70.plot: Eva blames Lucía for the death of her father and all the misfortunes that her family suffers, requires her to leave the house, but she refuses. The police arrest Guillermo for the assault at the liquor store.

71.title: ¡Roban el cuerpo de León Carvajal!
71.plot: Lucía confesses to Silvina that she is in love with Jacobo, but she will do anything to send him to prison. Jacobo and Barbara dig up León's coffin and discover that it is empty.

72.title: Eva está embarazada, ¿de Mateo o del Alacrán?
72.plot: Eva discovers that she is pregnant and does not know who the father of the baby is. Camilo tells Montilla the whole truth about Jacobo, but he does not believe him. El Alacrán kidnaps Eva outside the police offices.

73.title: ¡El Alacrán secuestra a Juliana!
73.plot: Lucía discovers that Jacobo sent the anonymous letters attacking her and Johny. Lucho discovers that Sergio was intimate with Juliana, he asks him not to tell anyone.

74.title: ¡Mateo ya sabe que Eva y El Alacrán son amantes!

75.title: Johny quiere matar a 'Jacobo'
75.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: The series is a complex story of destinies that intersect when they assassinate a media mogul on their wedding day, at the same time that an assassin in the United States is executed in the electric chair. The tycoon's soul is reincarnated in the body of the hit man and, in turn, the killer's soul ends up in the body of a professor of anthropology. Now, every man will not only have to deal with a new body, but also adapt to a new spirit.
imdb.title: Amar a muerte
plot: The series is a complex story of destinies that intersect when they assassinate a media mogul on their wedding day, at the same time that an assassin in the United States is executed in the electric chair. The tycoon's soul is reincarnated in the body of the hit man and, in turn, the killer's soul ends up in the body of a professor of anthropology. Now, every man will not only have to deal with a new body, but also adapt to a new spirit.
